comments:
Happens when trying to open popup menu on task in the task list.

Does the task have a repository (might be related to bug 161297)?
That I can't tell for sure. It is possible that I have some old tasks created while experimenting. Still, there should be check for that null value.

The problem is that Trac code assumes there is always a valid repository for a task. 

Rob, what is the current status on that? Does Bugzilla always check if repository objects returned by TasksUiPlugin.getRepositoryManager().getRepository() are not null?
Bugzilla is making this (false) assumption as well and for now I figure we just need to guard against it until we work out the long term strategy (archived repositories? etc).
